full_summary:
---

### Request for Proposal (RFP) - Heavy Duty Trucks with Water Tanks

---

#### Description

Canada invites qualified suppliers to provide three (3) firm and three (3) optional heavy duty trucks equipped with water tanks to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). The trucks will be used for transporting live juvenile and adult salmonids in the DFO's water tanks.

#### Requirements

*   Three (3) firm heavy duty trucks equipped with:
    *   Two 3200 liter water tanks (DFO supplied and installed)
    *   Additional features as specified in the RFP Document
*   Three (3) optional heavy duty trucks with the same features as above
*   All trucks to be delivered within British Columbia, Canada

#### Documents

The RFP document is attached to this request. Bidders are required to thoroughly review the document before submitting their proposals.

#### <<(Insert Attachment)>

#### Submission Instructions

Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Supply Chain Solution (SCS). Deadline for submission is March 18, 2024 at 2:00 PM Eastern Time. Late submissions will not be accepted.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification regarding this RFP, please contact:
David Murray  
Murray, David (SPAC/PSPC)  
Director, Supply Chain  
Public Works and Government Services Canada  
Phone: (insert phone number)  
Email: [murraydavid@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:murraydavid@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Important Dates

*   Publication date: February 6, 2024
*   Tender closing date: March 18, 2024
*   Expected contract start date: March 31, 2024

#### Trade Information

This request is governed by the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

However, since the contract value exceeds a certain limit, this tender is not limited to Canadian suppliers only. Suppliers from other participating countries may also be eligible to bid.
